org.openimaj.experiment.validation

Class ValidationRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.experiment.validation.ValidationRunner

  • public class ValidationRunner
extends Object
    Utility methods for performing validation and cross validation.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public static <DATASET extends Dataset<?>,ANALYSIS_RESULT,AGGREGATE_ANALYSIS_RESULT extends AnalysisResult> AGGREGATE_ANALYSIS_RESULT run(ResultAggregator<ANALYSIS_RESULT,AGGREGATE_ANALYSIS_RESULT> aggregator,
                                                                                                                                          DATASET dataset,
                                                                                                                                          CrossValidator<DATASET> cv,
                                                                                                                                          ValidationOperation<DATASET,ANALYSIS_RESULT> round)
        Perform cross validation using the given cross validation scheme on the given data. The results of operation from each round are aggregated by the given results aggregator.

        Rounds of the validation are performed in parallel using threads from the GlobalExecutorPool.

        Type Parameters:
        DATASET - The type of the dataset
        ANALYSIS_RESULT - The type of the analysis result from each round
        AGGREGATE_ANALYSIS_RESULT - The type of the aggregated analysis result
        Parameters:
        aggregator - the results aggregator
        dataset - the dataset
        cv - the cross-validation scheme
        round - the operation to perform in each round
        Returns:
        the aggregated analysis result from all rounds

      • run

        public static <DATASET extends Dataset<?>,ANALYSIS_RESULT,AGGREGATE_ANALYSIS_RESULT extends AnalysisResult> AGGREGATE_ANALYSIS_RESULT run(ResultAggregator<ANALYSIS_RESULT,AGGREGATE_ANALYSIS_RESULT> aggregator,
                                                                                                                                          DATASET dataset,
                                                                                                                                          CrossValidator<DATASET> cv,
                                                                                                                                          ValidationOperation<DATASET,ANALYSIS_RESULT> round,
                                                                                                                                          ThreadPoolExecutor pool)
        Perform cross validation using the given cross validation scheme on the given data. The results of operation from each round are aggregated by the given results aggregator.

        Rounds of the validation can be performed in parallel, using the available threads in the given pool.

        Type Parameters:
        DATASET - The type of the dataset
        ANALYSIS_RESULT - The type of the analysis result from each round
        AGGREGATE_ANALYSIS_RESULT - The type of the aggregated analysis result
        Parameters:
        aggregator - the results aggregator
        dataset - the dataset
        cv - the cross-validation scheme
        round - the operation to perform in each round
        pool - a thread-pool for parallel processing
        Returns:
        the aggregated analysis result from all rounds
